articles.content:
FSN E-Commerce Ventures, which runs the fashion and beauty platform Nykaa, today announced the resignation of its chief financial officer (CFO) Arvind Agarwal.

articles.title: Zomato Takes A Dig At Elon Musk With A Hilarious Spaghetti Meme: "Twitter Before And After'' - NDTV
articles.description: Food delivery company, Zomato, has posted a funny meme describing the current situation at Twitter.
articles.content:
The post is aptly captioned "Namaste''
Billionaire Elon Musk has been facing a barrage of criticism for the way he is handling things at the Twitter office. From confusion over the blue verification… [+2492 chars]

articles.author: Bloomberg
articles.title: Paytm slumps to new low as Macquarie sees risk from Ambani's financial foray - Economic Times
articles.description: Reliance Industries Ltd.s Jio Financial Services Ltd. “can pose a significant growth and market-share risk” for players such as Paytm and Bajaj Finance Ltd., Macquarie analysts led by Suresh Ganapathy wrote in a note on Monday.
